description: The Richardson Ship-drift derived Surface Current Data Set has been compiled from ship reports over the global ocean. The compilation of ship-drift is a joint effort between NOAA's  Climate Diagnostics Center (CDC), the  Cooperative Institute for Research in Environmental Sciences (CIRES), the National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR), and NOAA's  National Climatic Data Center (NCDC).
keywords: Oceans | Ocean surface Current | ship-drift, Cote d'Ivoire AOI
name: Cote d'Ivoire AOI current from NVODS
